 2003-09382003-06-120EC,  HEALTH,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
PrecisEnactment of an ORDER ADDING TOXIC SUBSTANCES TO SCHEDULE 1 TO THE CANADIAN ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION ACT, 1999 - which adds gaseous ammonia, ozone, nitric oxide, nitrogen dioxide, sulphur dioxide and other volatile organic compounds that participate in atmospheric photochemical reactions to Schedule 1 to the Act.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2003-0229 Publication Date: 2003-07-02
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Enactment of an ORDER ADDING TOXIC SUBSTANCES TO SCHEDULE 1 TO THE CANADIAN ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION ACT, 1999 - which adds gaseous ammonia, ozone, nitric oxide, nitrogen dioxide, sulphur dioxide and other volatile organic compounds that participate in atmospheric photochemical reactions to Schedule 1 to the Act.
